resources.string: To use QR code to scan and register the device, you need to turn on the camera and the permission to vibrate. Please allow
The permission to open the camera has been denied. You will not be able to use the scanning function
You have denied permission to allow the program to use the camera. If you need it, please open it in settings
Vibration permission has been denied, you will not be able to use the scanning function
You have refused to allow the program to use the vibration permission. If you need to, please open it in the settings
